sentences: Elusana on elu kõige ilusam asi.
Ta näeb alati elusana olemises head.
context: In Estonian, 'elusana' is a compound word formed from 'elu' (life) and 'sana' (word/essence). It refers to the vital energy or life force that animates living beings. The term suggests the essential quality that makes something alive - its vitality, liveliness, or the energetic essence of life itself.
